name: find_dependencies
description:
Find pack dependencies and update pack metadata.

Analyses:
- Integration/script imports
- Playbook sub-playbook calls
- Command usage across packs

Use Cases:
- Update pack_metadata.json dependencies
- Identify missing dependencies
- Audit pack relationships

input_path.description: Pack path to find dependencies. Example: 'Packs/MyPack'

no_update.description: Find dependencies without updating pack metadata

all_packs.description: Return dependencies for ALL packs as JSON

output_path.description: Path for dependencies JSON (with all_packs flag)

get_dependent_on.description: Get packs that depend ON the given pack
